name: RollerKnight
description:
Many knights have tried it before you, ridding the vampire of these lands and claiming it's castle as your own. You however, have a different tactic then most infiltrators. To avoid the countless traps the vampire has set out for invaders like you you're going to skate through his castle, as speed seems to be the only thing that this count hasn't accounted for. 

However, as the vampire notices your intrusion predator quickly becomes prey, are you fast enough to stay out of the vampire's clutches?

The Gameplay:

Roller Knight is an endless runner in which you play as a knight on roller-skates who is trying to escape a gothic castle while being chased by a vampire.

To not fall prey to the vampire you  will have to avoid obstacles by: Jumping, Sliding or moving to another lane. Furthermore, you'll have to keep up your speed by performing tricks. As speed is the only thing keeping the vampire from catching up.
